select u.id, u.account, u.avatar, u.email, u.status, u.member_time as memberTime, u.create_time as createTime, r.name as roleName from sys_user u left join sys_user_role ur on u.id = ur.user_id and ur.is_deleted = 0 left join sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.id and r.is_deleted = 0 where u.is_deleted = 0
and u.account like concat('%', #{account}, '%')
and r.name = #{roleName}
and date_format(u.create_time,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginCreateTime},'%Y%m%d')
and date_format(u.create_time,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endCreateTime},'%Y%m%d')
and date_format(u.member_time,'%Y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginCreateTime},'%Y%m%d')
and date_format(u.member_time,'%Y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endMemberTime},'%Y%m%d')
order by u.create_time desc
limit #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}
